name: NSPort
desc: An abstract class that represents a communication channel.

items.name: + port
items.desc: Creates and returns a new NSPort object capable of both sending and receiving messages.

items.name: - invalidate
items.desc: Marks the receiver as invalid and posts an NSPortDidBecomeInvalidNotification to the default notification center.

items.name: - setDelegate:
items.desc: Sets the receiver’s delegate to a given object.

items.name: - sendBeforeDate:components:from:reserved:
items.desc: This method is provided for subclasses that have custom types of NSPort.

items.name: - sendBeforeDate:msgid:components:from:reserved:
items.desc: This method is provided for subclasses that have custom types of NSPort.

items.name: - removeFromRunLoop:forMode:
items.desc: This method should be implemented by a subclass to stop monitoring of a port when removed from a give run loop in a given input mode.

items.name: - scheduleInRunLoop:forMode:
items.desc: This method should be implemented by a subclass to set up monitoring of a port when added to a given run loop in a given input mode.
